home.notification: We are accepting project proposals until September 1, 2024. <guidelines>Submit proposal now</guidelines>.
home.heroText: Propose a project for a green space. Ideas with the most votes will get funding.

eligibleProjects.title: Eligible Projects
eligibleProjects.canSmall: Small area with a few trees

fundsAllocated.title: How are funds allocated?
fundsAllocated.votingMechanism: A new voting mechanism is used, called Quadratic Funding. The project with most donations will get the most funding from the City.
fundsAllocated.allowsAnyone: It allows anyone to vote by donating money to their favourite projects. With every donation, funding is given to project fromthe matching pool.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.voting: Why are we voting with donations?
faq.votingAnswer: A new voting mechanism is used, called Quadratic Funding. The project with most donations will get the most funding from the City. It allows anyone to vote by donating money to their favourite projects. With every donation, funding is given to project from the matching pool.
faq.city: Why does the city use Quadratic funding instead of simple voting?
faq.cityAnswer: A new voting mechanism is used, called Quadratic Funding. The project with most donations will get the most funding from the City. It allows anyone to vote by donating money to their favourite projects. With every donation, funding is given to project from the matching pool.
faq.voteAnswer: A new voting mechanism is used, called Quadratic Funding. The project with most donations will get the most funding from the City. It allows anyone to vote by donating money to their favourite projects. With every donation, funding is given to project from the matching pool.
faq.canVoteAnswer: A new voting mechanism is used, called Quadratic Funding. The project with most donations will get the most funding from the City. It allows anyone to vote by donating money to their favourite projects. With every donation, funding is given to project from the matching pool.
faq.decide: Who decides which proposals will be accepted for voting and how?
faq.decideAnswer: A new voting mechanism is used, called Quadratic Funding. The project with most donations will get the most funding from the City. It allows anyone to vote by donating money to their favourite projects. With every donation, funding is given to project from the matching pool.
faq.shouldAnswer: A new voting mechanism is used, called Quadratic Funding. The project with most donations will get the most funding from the City. It allows anyone to vote by donating money to their favourite projects. With every donation, funding is given to project from the matching pool.

homeAbout.title: About the project
homeAbout.firstParagraph: This project is pilot of Muqa - Municipal Quadratic Funding Initiative. It is based on the technology of Ethereum and idea of Quadratic funding.
homeAbout.secondParagraph: Development of our application is funded by Ethereum Foundation. Learn more about Muqa here.

cart.finalSubmission: This submission is final. Once you submit your ballot, you won't be able to change it.
cart.donationSuccess: Your donation has been successfully received!
